vsParam: Alright, I think all these "Plums" should be enough.

taste good in cuisines besides being used in alchemy.

Yeah~
Um, it just occurred to me...

Cuisines are similar to alchemy, right?
Specifically, you stir the cauldron back and forth.

Oh, that's true.
Rorona uses her cauldron to make pies.

Oh...
By the way, [px] used the cauldron to make many cuisines too!

Including soup, stuffed buns, juice, and jam!
Even spaghetti!

Huh? Really?

Well, not all of them, but [px] made most of them.
Actually, I'm very good at cooking.

Sure enough...
Alchemy is really profound...

If you could even make cuisines with alchemy,
I'm confused about what alchemy really is...

... I've never thought about alchemy much from the very beginning
as there are many alchemists from different worlds...

Haha...
Sterk, it seems very tough for you.
